column1: full, and just wide outside off. Driven with the bat's open face to cover point
flighted full on middle stump, angling in as Walton misses the flick. Hits his pad, but the lbw appeal is turned down. Would've gone down leg
good length outside off. A half-tracker, but Walton can only flat-bat this to mid on. Played off the back foot
tossed up, but defended off the front foot. Pitched on middle, but no real turn just yet
flatter, and short on middle. Makes room on the leg side to try and find some space, but can only cut it to point. Five dots to start off
good length on middle and angling right in. Tries to flick towards the leg side but misses. Starts off with a maiden
good length on leg stump and angling across the right-hander. Defended off the back foot towards the leg side and yes, they're off the mark!
full on middle, and driven with minimal footwork. Straight to cover, who swoops down and collects

it's all happening! Batsman and bowler collide, and then a direct-hit as well, but they're safe. Good length on leg stump, and the batsman misses the flick. Hits his pads and goes to the off side as Walton runs into Usman trying to take the single. Danger averted
full on off and swinging slightly away. Driven with the bat's open face, but only to cover point
good length on leg stump. Forces Fletcher to see this through and defend off the back foot. Tapped to Usman
full on off, and that's been smacked hard on the off side. Carved this behind square, but straight to Shadab at point. That must've stung the fielder!

Sliced to mid off! Walton goes without opening his account. Good length on off, and he goes to the back foot to try and heave it over cover, but in no position to play that shot. Attempted to muscle this, but skied it instead
full on middle and stump. Aimed straight at his toes, and he can only nudge this towards midwicket
full on off stump, tries to defend off the back foot but through his shot too early. Tapped to mid on with soft hands eventually
good length on middle stump, nudged off his pads to midwicket. Played from deep inside the crease
straight as an arrow! Uses his feet this time, and comes down the wicket. The ball's full on off, and Samuels easily drives this past the bowler's right. No stopping that
uses his feet once again to come down the wicket. Flicks off his boots to the leg side
good length on leg stump, tapped off the back foot to wide mid on. Calls early for the single
back of a length but once again on leg stump. Defended off the back foot towards the leg side

slower ball, short on leg stump. He tries to drags a pull towards deep midwicket, but through his shot too early. Hits the bat's shoulder, but drops short of Sarfraz. Well deceived delivery from Usman there
frees his arms! Good length on middle, and just about enough width for the batsman to cut this square. Placed past point, and beats the two infielders
good length on leg stump, blocked off the back foot to mid on. No chance of a run there
good-length on leg stump. Comfortably clipped off the back foot to the man at square leg for a walking single
back of a length on middle. Skids onto the batsman and he's forced to defend off the back foot. Played from near his face, and sent to the off side rather uncomfortably
good length on off, and angling across. Tries to drive to cover, but takes a thick outside edge. Goes to third man on the bounce
full on off stump, and Samuels opens his stance a bit. Tries to muscle this towards the leg side, but mistimed to mid on
good length on middle and slightly slower this time. Samuels tries to slog this towards cow corner, but he's deceived by the pace. Goes to the keeper
back of a length outside leg stump, drags his pull along the ground to deep backward square on this occasion
check-pulled over long on! First six of the match. Good length on leg, and the debutant is sent beyond the boundary. Gauged the length early, and hit this flat over mid on's head
good length on off stump, but the ball stays low. Tries to pull square but hits his knee roll. The ball trickles away towards point
full on off stump, driven off the front foot but straight to cover
good length on off and angling into Fletcher. Tries to heave this towards the leg side, but bottom edges it onto his pads. Misses out this time
good length on off stump but Fletcher comes dancing down the wicket. Tries to cut square but the ball's too close to his body. Uncomfortably cuts towards point
short and wide outside off, and Fletcher stands tall on this occasion. Cut off the back foot, and the ball sneaks past backward point's right
good length on off stump, tries to pull square but the ball stays low once again! Goes through to the keeper, but how did that miss the outside of off stump?
leading edge, but just short of the bowler. Good length on leg stump, and Samuels had to check his shot coming down the wicket. Hits the bat's top half and falls just in front of Nawaz diving forward
good length on off stump, tries to muscle this towards the leg side, but mistimed back towards the bowler
over long off! Clean as a whistle. Full on off, and he dances down the wicket to lift it over Nawaz's head. Off the bat's middle and Samuels displays the bat's full followthrough
full on leg stump but Samuels can't flick it to the leg side. Nawaz bowled it faster, because he expected Samuels to come down the wicket. Smart bowling
full on middle, shimmies down the wicket and smacks this over long on this time! Hit flat over the fielder in the deep. Could've easily holed out, but the connection off the bat was sublime
full on leg stump, tapped to wide long on for a walking single

full on off stump and he tries to drive inside out. Through his shot too early, and the ball's in the air. Drops just short of the cover fielder diving forward. Fakhar almost completed the catch, there
acrobatic from Faheem at deep backward point! Half-tracker outside off, and cut hard past the infield. Faheem had to run to his left and intercepted it while diving. Excellent
good length just outside off, spinning slightly away and cut to point
good length on off stump, rocks onto the back foot and mistimes down the ground. Hit to long on
tossed up full outside off. The batsman walks across to the off side and defends towards Faheem at cover
quicker ball, on a good length. Pitches on middle and Fletcher easily taps this to square leg off the back foot
good length on leg stump. Starts off with a slower ball, and Fletcher defends off the back foot
short on leg, and pulled along the carpet. The man at cow corner is positioned exactly for that kind of shot
back of a length on leg, Samuels tries to pull but the ball gets bit onto him. Hits the bat's top half, but falls safe on the leg side. This boy's quick!
slower ball on leg stump, rolling his fingers over the delivery. Pitches full on leg, and Samuels taps it back to the bowler
too short on middle, and another slower ball. Not in control, and goes too wide. Samuels frees his arms and cuts this square! Inexperience showing slightly
sticks with the short ball, pulled off the back foot to deep backward square
good length on off stump, rocks onto the back foot and punches to cow corner
overpitched just outside off, and Samuels' drive doesn't connect. Slides under his bat and through to Sarfraz
flighted full outside off, and enough time for Samuels to drive this through the ball's line. Hit through the cordon at extra cover. Sarfraz isn't happy
full on off again, and turning away from the batsman. Struck hard to deep extra cover again. Sarfraz goes to the bowler to have a chat
short on middle, and Fletcher swivels to pull! The ball was going down the leg side and he easily muscles this past the man at short fine leg. Pays the price for dropping this short
almost a medium-pacer this time. Quicker and short on off stump. Heaved towards square leg off the back foot for a run
good length on off, and punched to mid off. He's halfway down the wicket before Samuels asks him to go back. Manages to slide back home in time

good length on middle stump, takes a few steps down the wicket and pulls it over wide long on! Flat-batted, really, and it goes ten metres over the boundary. The ball angled into Fletcher, allowing him to reach at it easily
low full toss on leg stump. Tries to muscle towards square leg but misses. Hits his pad, and the ball goes away towards the off side
good length on off stump, angling into him, and tapped to the leg side
short on off stump, but pulled along the carpet this time. Hit well, but straight to the man positioned at deep midwicket
full on leg stump and comfortably nudged to square leg for a walking single. He'll keep strike
not afraid to toss it up again, and almost gets a wicket for it. Full ball, and driven over the infield. Slices it slightly, and almost holes out to deep extra cover
full on off, and the drive takes an outside edge. Goes to short third man

gets him with the googly! Good length on off, and spins into Samuels this time. The wrong'un after two legspinners and Shadab earns this wicket with his wit. The ball slides between bat and pad and crashes into middle stump. Breaks a 72-run partnership
full on off stump, but no spin this time. Defended off the front foot to cover
flighted and full on off stump. Prods forward and turns it off his boots to square leg. First T20I runs for the batsman
quicker ball, short on leg. Punched off the back foot to cow corner with relative ease for a walking single
good length on off stump, and tapped with soft hands to the leg side. Nawaz runs to the leg side and has a shy at the non-striker's
good length, but outside off stump. Goes deep onto the back foot and punches down the ground. Long off positioned there
full on leg stump, perhaps because the batsman was coming down the ground. Driven to long on this time

full on leg stump, and he's down on one knee. Tries to slog sweep, and it's hit well, but Faheem's getting under it. Manages to parry this back from the backward-square boundary. Stops the six for certain
good length on off stump, makes room on the leg side and tries to cut. Mistimed back to the bowler
good length on middle as McCarthy walks to the off side. Tries to paddle sweep, but can't connect. Nawaz gets away, you'd think. Should've been a wide
tossed up, and sent over long off! His 6th T20I fifty. Full outside off, and smacked very hard straight down the ground
full, but wider outside off. Driven with the bat's open face to deep extra cover
tossed up on off stump, big wind up and driven down the ground to long on. McCarthy looking solid for now
another wrong'un! Short on off but sliding into the right-hander. Manages to tap a cut shot to point
flighted on off stump, and he tries to send this over long off once again! It's come off the bat's toe-end though, and the skier's comfortably taken by long off running in

good length on middle and spins into the batsman. Tries to flick to the leg side but misses. The ball hits his pad and drops near the keeper. Sarfraz takes the bails off, but was Fletcher in? Yes, just managed to put his feet back in. Sharp work from the keeper though, very alert
good length on off, and angling into Powell. Tapped off the back foot to the non-striker
good length on middle and going down the leg side. Tries to flick fine, but misses. Hits his thigh pad and runs down quite fine to the boundary. Just a bit awry in line on this occasion
full on off stump, driven down the ground to long on for a walking single

full on off stump, and driven to mid off. They want the quick run, but mid off's throw is a direct-hit! We're going upstairs. Nawaz the man with the gun throw, and yes, Fletcher's gone! A metre or two short. Big wicket
full on middle stump, gets inside the ball's line and driven to wide long on
good length, but wide outside off. Pokes at it, and taps it square to point

big appeal, and umpire Dar raises his finger. Powell reviews. Full on middle stump and angling into his pads. Missed the leg-side flick and the ball hit his front pad. Looks like it's out, to be honest, given there's no bat involved as well. Yep, he's gone - the ball would've crashed into leg stump. West Indies spiraling once again
good length on off, and the back-foot defense comes off the bat's top half. In the air, but just short of Faheem diving to his right. Ooo, that was close
back of a length on middle, manages to tap it towards midwicket off the back foot
good length outside off, Punched firmly past cover to the man in the deep
good length on off stump, goes onto the back foot and defends it back to the bowler
good length on off stump, pokes at it and cuts to the man in the deep. He'll keep strike for the next over
good length on middle and leg, turned off his pads to fine leg with ease. The angle from around the wicket helped
slower ball, and full on off stump. Flicked off his pads over midwicket on this occasion
good length on middle. It's the slower ball, so Ramdin had to wait for it. Eventually pulls it square to cow corner
good length on middle, and Mohammed tries to slog this towards the leg side. Manages to only mistime towards midwicket
good length outside off. Makes room on the leg side and cuts to point. Mistimed once again, which actually allows them to rotate the strike

full on off, and Ramdin has flat-batted this down the ground. Hit very hard, and Shaheen did well to get out of the ball's way. It races away to the long-off boundary, and Shaheen will be lucky he escaped unhurt. Managed to get fingertips to it, perhaps, but the ball did not slow down
good length on middle stump, muscles this pull to the man at cow corner once again. Three men in the deep on the leg side
slower ball, short on off. Tries to pull but through his shot way too early. The ball loops over Ramdin's shoulder and through to Sarfraz

lucky! Short on middle and angling down leg. Ramdin attempts another pull, but takes the outside edge. Flies past Sarfraz's right and into the third-man boundary. The keeper was wrong-footed because he was following Ramdin's leg-side trigger movement
full on leg stump and Ramdin's quick to open his stance. Slogs this, and uses his wrists to whip this over square leg. Chase for deep backward square, but he loses the race
slower ball, short outside off. Drags this pull to deep midwicket on this occasion. Mistimed the shot, courtesy Usman's slower-ball variation
short on leg stump, but too easy for Mohammed. Walks across to the off side and paddles this fine past short fine leg! Expensive over

shoulder-high full toss on middle stump. Tries to pull, but top edged, and taken by Faheem. He knows it's a no ball, so doesn't even bother celebrating. The ball slipped from his hand, you'd think. Free hit
good-length ball, and it's been heaved over to the leg side. Not hit well enough, and it'll fall short of deep backward square

full just outside off, but angling into Mohammed. Goes deep into his crease and gets under this delivery. The attempted yorker doesn't come off, and Mohammed comfortably smacks this over mid off. One-bounce for four
good length on middle stump, pulled along the ground to cow corner again. Man there
excellent ball! Yorker wide outside leg, and goes between Ramdin's legs. He knew the batsman was going to walk towards the leg side, so he directed the delivery on his toes
cheeky! Paddled over short fine leg! Good-length ball outside off, but Ramdin shuffled across to the off side and helped the ball on its way. Scooped into the fine-leg boundary this time

deposited into the stands! Full on middle, and Ramdin leans into the leg-side slog. Gets his left leg out of the way and has a proper swing of the bat. Well connected and into the first tier behind backward square. Seventeen off the over
full and wide outside off. Just inside the tramlines though. He tried to reach at it, but can't connect. Through to Sarfraz
another overpitched ball wide outside off. Mohammed made room on the leg side so can't get bat to ball. The drive is played down the wrong line. Two dots to start the last over
nicked! Earns a wicket for some good bowling. Full on off stump, and Mohammed's straight drive doesn't come off. Takes a feather edge and into Sarfraz's gloves. Three dots now
full just outside off, goes for a wild swing but inside-edged onto his pads. Manages to get Ramdin back on strike for the last two balls
in the slot to be punished, and smashed over Usman's head! It's full and he goes deep into the crease to make that extra space. Clears his front leg, and smashes it into the long-off boundary

ends with another six! Full on leg stump, and Ramdin goes deep into the crease again. Has a full swing of the bat, and it's connected. Soars into the cow-corner boundary and West Indies finish on 153 for 6
this is a half-volley on off stump, Fakhar leans forward and caresses this between extra cover and mid-off.
slash and a miss. This short of length delivery cut back in to beat the inside edge
gentle little dab into the off side as they scamper a quick single
angles a full delivery on the stumps from wide of the crease, pushed to mid on
leans right forward and defends this full delivery to extra cover
angles this length ball back in, cramps Babar for room as he defends back down the pitch
good length just outside off, tapped off his pads to the leg side this time
short on off stump, stands tall and pulls over square leg. Chase for Walton in the deep, but manages to pull it back
width offered outside off, and Babar continues right where he left off from. Crunches a cut short away from his body, and races away past point!
good length outside off and angling inwards. Chopped down to short third man
short on middle and Fakhar comes down the wicket to pull to the cow-corner boundary. Flat-batted this with some ferocity to the leg side. What strength!
good length on middle stump, and it's defended off the back foot to the bowler. Emrit throws at the stumps, and hits it, but why?! Fakhar was always in. Frustration showing, slightly
good length on off, stands tall and punches down the ground to mid on
width offered once again, and slapped past point with ease. Stays on the back foot and plays this late. Played between the two infielders on the off side
good length on off stump, and angling into Fakhar. Attempts a leg-side slog, but not off the bat's middle. Doesn't matter though - it soars over long on for a maximum
short outside off, and once again Fakhar uses the width to cut this square. Played finer than the cut played two balls earlier, and this time third man's chase is futile
waist-high full toss just outside off. Tapped to cover for a quick single. Could be dangerous, but Walton misses the direct hit
good length on middle, and pulled well. Played along the ground to deep midwicket
back of a length, but wide outside off again. Waits for the ball to get to him, and pokes it over point's head. Fletcher chases behind it, but his effort is futile in the end
punched past cover! Exquisite from Babar. Good length outside off, and Babar takes a step forward to punch it away from him. Had to tip-toe slightly, but placed the shot extremely well
full on middle and leg, flicked off his pads to midwicket. Stopped by the man there, which forces Babar to not take the second
full just outside off. Fakhar takes a step forward and mistimes a drive to mid on

big wind up from Fakhar, and sent over long on! Full on off, but Fakhar's seeing this ball like a watermelon. Got his front leg out of the way and hit it clean as a whistle. Shows his followthrough off after playing that shot

full on middle stump, and Fakhar's expecting that length. Goes deep into his crease to find that extra second and then swings hard at it. Clanked towards the cow-corner boundary this time. Also the team fifty
full on middle and leg, flicked off his toes to square leg for a walking single
full on off stump, and Fakhar comes down the wicket. Muscles this drive past Badree's left to long on
full on middle and leg, tries to whip it fine, but played to short fine leg
full on leg stump, this time it's clipped square to the man in the deep. Calls early for the second, and they jog back comfortably
good length on middle stump, goes onto the back foot and flicked to the deep once again. Another comfortable double
full on leg stump, shimmies down the wicket and taps it to mid on. Straight to the fielder
good length on middle, and the batsman shuffles to the leg side. Makes that extra room, and then muscles this inside out past mid off's right. Not hit well, but well enough to beat the infielder
feather edge! and Fakhar goes. Good length on off, and the batsman comes down the wicket. Tries to flat-bat towards the leg side, but the extra bounce takes the top edge. Through to Ramdin
good length just outside off, and extra bounce first up for Talat to deal with. Deals with it well though, by bending his knees and getting out of the ball's line
short on middle stump. Talat tries to flick it fine down the leg side but the ball hits his thigh pad. It trickles down to short fine leg
back of a length just outside off, stays on the back foot and chops it down to third man. He's off the mark
back of a length outside off, and Babar misses the square punch. Tried to ride the bounce and play towards cover, but the ball goes over his bat

hesitation, but safe! Good length on middle, and flicked towards square leg. They're in two minds but finally take the single. The throw from the keeper, though, was poor. Under-arm throw that doesn't even trouble the non-striker
flat and short outside off. Cut off the back foot to deep extra cover. They walk across for the single
half-tracker on middle and leg, tapped off the back foot to deep midwicket on this occasion
full on off stump, takes a step forward and drives down the ground to long off
delightful! Plays the late cut. Short on off stump, and enough width for Talat to work this square. Rolls his wrists over this shot, and plays it finer than usual
tossed up on off stump. Almost a yorker, but Talat manages to tap it down the ground to long off
good length just outside off. Angling into Talat, and it's punched off the back foot to deep extra cover
half-tracker outside off. Goes deep into his crease and pulls this vehemently past midwicket. Perfectly placed between long on and deep midwicket. Too short on this occasion from the part-time bowler
another short ball outside off. Babar waits for it before cutting square. Hit to point though
full on off stump, drags a leg-side shot towards deep backward square
short outside off, and Talat punches off the back foot to the man in the deep. They walk across for a single
good length on middle and leg, takes a step to the leg side and punches this down the ground to long on
tossed up on middle, turning away from Babar and he drives with the turn. Smacked to long off
full on middle stump, takes a step towards the leg side and drives past the non-striker to long off again
good length just outside off, mistimes his cut shot to cover point. Hard for Badree to grip this ball. It's quite dewy
it's flighted on middle and Talat comes dancing down the wicket. Converts it into a low full toss, and taps it down to long on
back of a length on middle, flicked off his pads to deep midwicket on this occasion. Easy runs on offer
full on middle stump, takes a step down the ground and taps it to long off. He'll keep strike once again
starts off with a loose one, but Babar doesn't punish it. Good length outside off, and cut straight to point
good length on off, punched down the ground - past the non-striker's left - to long on. Easy pickings
full on leg stump, takes a step down the ground, and blocks it towards the bowler
full on off stump, no footwork from Talat as he attempts to punch square. Takes the inside edge, however, and goes down to short fine leg instead
full on off stump, shimmies down the wicket and lifts it over cover. There's protection in the deep though
short just outside off, swivels and pulls down the ground to long on. They jog across for the single
good length on off, and angling away from Talat. He goes onto the back foot, and cuts this late. Beats the diving short third-man fielder!
good length on off and angling further away. Cuts this late behind square, and the diving short third-man fielder can't stop it!
full on middle and leg, tapped to the man at midwicket off the front foot
full on off, rolls his wrists over this shot as he whips it wide long on for a single
full on off stump, came down the wicket to meet this on the full. Tapped to long on
full just outside off, takes a few steps forward and drives it square to the man in the deep
overpitched just outside off, tries to drive square but manages to toe-end it instead. Squeezed away past backward point this time and Pakistan start the over with a boundary

full on middle stump, takes a step forward and drives to Emrit at long on. Misfield, though, as the ball goes through his hands. Manages to pull it back before the ball hit the ropes though. Sloppy stuff and Emrit apologises to the bowler
good length just outside off, grips and turns inwards this time. The late cut goes straight to short third man
tossed up, and overpitched on off stump. Dug away with the bat's open face to deep point
full on leg stump, no real spin this time. Comfortably tapped down the ground to wide long on
full on off stump. Babar takes a few steps down the group and whips it off his toes to deep midwicket

good length just outside off. Angling into Babar as he punches inside the line of the ball. Hit straight back to Smith, who almost took a one-handed catch low to his right. Eventually goes past him to mid off
full and wide outside off. The ball's angling away from Talat, and he drives away from his body. Played with the bat's open face and runs it down to deep backward point
back of a length outside off, leans into a punch off the back foot, but straight to point
full and wide outside off. Takes a big step forward and drives exquisitely past cover. It's crunched through the cordon and Babar brings up another T20 fifty
holes out next ball! Good length on middle, and he tries to pull behind square. Flicked it, really, but flicked way too well. Taken by Walton near the boundary
full on leg stump, clipped off his pads to deep backward square. Off the mark straight away
full on middle stump, comfortably whipped off his pads to square leg. Lots of vacant spots there for the batsman to take the single
good length, wide outside off. Carved square off the back foot to deep backward point on this occasion
back of a length on off. Gets big on Asif, who does well to tap it down with soft hands
low full toss on leg stump, and it's been flicked fine down the leg side. The ball doesn't come off the bat, but takes the outside of his pad instead
full on middle stump, flicked off his pads, but straight to square leg. Well hit, though
good length on off stump. Angling into Asif, and he defends off the front foot. Tapped right back tot the bowler
full outside off, and angling further away. Drives at it, but takes a thick outside edge. The ball runs down to third man
good length outside off, and Asif tries to slap this square. Takes another thick outside edge, and the ball goes down to third man
slower ball, full outside leg. Comfortably flicked off his toes to deep backward square for two more
back of a length on middle stump, pulled along the ground to midwicket. They're off for the quick single, and make it in just fine
goes short this time! Pitches on middle stump, and Asif's happy to duck under this ball
back of a length outside off, and that's been caressed behind square! Stuck his bat out and slapped this with the bat's open face past third man! No stopping that
tries the slower ball, but the delivery doesn't come out well. Short and very wide outside off
full on off stump. Uses his wrists to whip this towards midwicket. Played from top of off stump this time
good length on off stump, tapped with soft hands to wide long on. Puts some pressure on the fielder running in, and Asif easily completes the second
good length on middle, angling down the leg side and he helps it on its way to deep backward square
good length outside off, but it's the offcutter this time. Jags inwards but Asif comfortably chops it down to third man
short on off stump, drags this pull from over his head to deep backward square. Well negotiated by Asif
good length just outside off, opens his bat's face and easily runs it down to the fielder at third man
good length, but wide outside off. Talat is forced to reach at it, but can't connect. Through to Ramdin on the bounce
short on middle, and pulled emphatically behind square! Over square leg, and fine leg has no chance to pull it back. Terrific shot
short on middle, and pulled once again! Much better this time, and also much squarer. Smacked into the stands
slower ball, full on off stump. Tapped with the bat's open face towards point. They scamper across for a quick run
full on off stump, takes a step in front and defends towards point
short on leg, and that's been pulled by Talat! Hit past the square-leg umpire and the ball crashes into the boundary. Pakistan win by eight wickets!
